name: Christmas Sale Lace Frontals
description:
Freestyle

Middle Left and Right Parting

Natural Color: Black

Origins: Malaysian Peruvian Indian and Brazilian

Lace Frontals are half wig frontal pieces which can be worn across the front hairline to close sewn in extension matching same texture at the back of the head for complete application. Lace frontals can also be integrated with own natural hair. All silk base frontals must be custom ordered. Silk base frontals are made at all hair lengths and measures 13'x4'

name: Christmas Sale Silk Base Closure
description:
Free Style

Middle Parting

Left and Right Parting

Natural Color: Black

Origin: Brazilian Peruvian Malaysian and Indian

Silk Base is flesh color silk material (usually 3'x5' or 4'x4') Available in 3 partings left side, middle and right side part. Middle parting and freestyle. Individual hairs are then pulled through the material an hand-tied from underneath the silk. The results is the appearance of the scalp with hair growing from out of it. It adds a more natural look to a weave install especially when parting the hair. The knots are hidden under the silk base are not visible giving the illusion of the growing directly from your scalp and looks unbelievably rel

name: Christmas Sale Lace Closure
description:
Free Style

Middle Parting

Left and Right Parting

Natural Color: Black

Origin: Brazilian Peruvian Malaysian and Indian

Our Lace Closure is the final piece to complement a wavy curly or straight extension install. This closure can be parted in any direction and is a natural addition to complete your crown. Our Closures contain baby hair in the front so it simulates the look of your natural hairline. They are also very easy to style and maintain just like your hair extension weave. The base is made of lace for the ultimate in breathability and comfort if you're looking for a more realistic and snug fit
